Grand_Junction.Orchard Mesa, Colorado:
Orchard Mesa is an unincorporated community in Mesa County, Colorado, adjacent to the city of Grand Junction. The population was 6,836 in the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Orchard Mesa is at 39°02′19″N 108°31′33″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the community has a total area of 5.6 square miles (15 km2), of which 5.4 square miles (14 km2) is land and 0.2 square miles (0.52 km2), or 3.42%, is water.
